title: Please help identifying this font
content:
I know I posted this already, but I can't seem to find it on the forum at all. Can someone please help identify the fonts in the menu board below? I have the Taquiera font, but I need the others. Thank you in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [photo.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829183650/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_58.JPG) | 875.71 KB |
author: jennmertle

comments.content:
I think it's one of the Sign Painter House fonts (also used for the MTV brand).

[http://www.houseind.com/fonts/signpainter](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829183650/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/signpainter)
